text: musariko mate vacana allaha ane tena payagambara vacce kevi rite rahi sake che te loko sivaya jemani sathe tame samadhana ane vacana masjide harama pase karyum che, jyam sudhi te loko tamari sathe samadhananum vacana purum kare to tame pana temani sathe pramanikata dakhavo, allaha ta'ala daravavala'one pasanda kare che
